      • DFSUtilContinents

        private static HashSet<Country> DFSUtilContinents(List<Country> map,
                                                  HashSet<Country> visited,
                                                  Country start,
                                                  GameMap completeMap)
        Performs a DFS on every continent, works using recursion.
        Parameters:
        map - A List of all countries.
        visited - A HashMap of visited countries.
        start - The Country to start from.
        completeMap - The entire GameMap to look through.
        Returns:
        visited countries of a continent

      • DFSUtilWholeMap

        private static HashSet<String> DFSUtilWholeMap(HashSet<String> visited,
                                               String start,
                                               GameMap completeMap)
        Performs a DFS on the whole game map, works using recursion.
        Parameters:
        visited - A HashMap of visited countries.
        start - The name of the Country to start with.
        completeMap - The entire GameMap to look through.
        Returns:
        visited countries of the whole map
